spell.name: Morning Start
spell.description: * Draw 5 cards. * Exhaust Morning Start. * If you haven't Exhausted a Morning Start this combat: * Draw a card from your deck: * If it's a Major Arcana, also take the "Addicted" Minor Injury. * If you have already Exhausted a Morning Start, this combat: * Take the "Addicted" Minor Injury. * Also take the "Heart Palpitations" Major Injury.
spell.flavor: With taurine, ginseng, caffeine, amphetamines, and a little bit of our proprietary Formula X, Morning Start is the perfect way to start your day. Get in the Morning Start habit!
